subtitle: mashriq va mag̲h̲rib men̲ sarqah bāzī kī tārīk̲h̲
contributions: University of Karachi. Shuʻbah-yi Taṣnīf o Tālīf o Tarjumah.
title: Cih dilāvar ast
by_statement: murattibīn, Sulaimān Cishtī, Rīḥān Cishtī ; muqaddamah, Sayyid K̲h̲ālid Jāmaʻī.
other_titles: History of plagiarism in East and West
publishers: Shuʻbah-yi Taṣnīf o Tālīf va Tarjamah, Karācī Yūnīvarsiṭī

description.value: Research study on the history of plagiarism in East and West published in monthly Mehr-i Nīm Roz; contributed articles.

notes.value:
"ʻAllāmah Aslam Jīrāj Pūrī, Niyāz Fatiḥpūrī, Ḍākṭar Amīn Miṣrī, Molvī ʻAbdulḥaq, Mirzā G̲h̲ulām Aḥmad Qādiyānī, Maulānā Abualkalām Āzād, Qāzī ʻAbdulg̲h̲āfār, Muḥammad Ḥusain Āzād, Dānte, Aiḍvarḍ Hainrī Pāmr, Ḍākṭar Sarādhā Krishan, ʻAṣmat Cug̲h̲tāʼī, Krishan Candar, Ḍākṭar Mīr Valīuddīn, Profaisar Āl Aḥmad Sarvar, Yūnus Baṭ, N. M. Rāshid ke sarqon̲ kī sarguzasht".

Includes bibliographical references.

In Urdu; some in English and Arabic.
